Gatte, Sr., 82, passed away early Saturday morning, May 16, 2020. Ron was born January 28, 1938 in Youngstown, the son of Emerson and Edythe (Felton) Gatte. He was a maintenance mechanic and journeyman for the General Electric Lamp Plant. Ron was a graduate of East High School. He was a member of St. Luke Catholic Church and treasurer for his local union. He was an avid golfer, loved to fish and active in little league baseball. Ron will be always remembered lovingly by his wife, Jane (Pezzuolo) Gatte, whom he married in 1961; three ...
